original_text: Aristarchus my fellow prisoner greets you, and Mark the cousin of Barnabas (concerning whom you have received instructions—if he comes to you, welcome him),
korean_text: 나와 함께 갇힌 아리스다고와 바나바의 생질 마가와 (이 마가에 대하여 너희가 명을 받았으매 그가 이르거든 영접하라)

sentences.original_text: Aristarchus my fellow prisoner greets you
and Mark the cousin of Barnabas
concerning whom you have received instructions
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람에 관하여 너희가 지시를 받았으니
